short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Identify harmful ingredients in your food

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Mission of this extension is to "make People eat healthier, shop smarter: Transform the buying habits for better food choices"

It uses GPT-4 to identify harmful ingredients in the food you order and reports back the harmfulness when you consume those ingredients

To make this extension work 

1. Download the Extension from
2. Enter the OpenAI API Key in the Extension's options page and press "Save"
3. Navigate to the supported site's cart page
4. Hover over the Info Icon near the product name to learn about harmful ingredients
